mapper.insert: insert into mem_info(mem_id, mem_email, mem_pw, mem_nick, mem_reg_date) values(#{mem_id},#{mem_email},#{mem_pw},#{mem_nick}, now())
insert into board(mem_id, board_date) values(#{mem_id}, now()), (#{mem_id}, '9999-12-31')
insert into mem_option(mem_id, mem_auth, mem_post_def_secret) values(#{mem_id}, 1, 1)
insert into confirm_email(mem_id, email_auth, email_key) values(#{mem_id}, false, #{authCode})
mapper.select: select * from mem_info where mem_id LIKE concat('%',#{mem_id},'%')
select * from mem_info where mem_nick LIKE concat('%',#{mem_nick},'%')
mapper.update: update mem_option set mem_auth = 1 where mem_id = #{mem_id}
update mem_option set mem_auth = 2 where mem_id = #{mem_id}

update mem_option set mem_auth = case when mem_auth = 1 then 2 else 1 end where mem_id = #{mem_id}
